email-review-schedule-title: A scheduled ad is awaiting review
email-review-schedule-body:
A scheduled ad from :scheduler for the campaign :campaign is pending review.

You can use the link below to access it directly.
email-welcome-title: A Neo-OOH account has been given to you
email-welcome-body:
Welcome!
A Neo account gives you access to Neo-OOH web-services.

Please click on the link below to complete your account configuration.
email-password-recovery-body: Click on the link below to reset you Neo account's password.
email-2fa-body: Enter the code below to confirm your connection to your Neo-ooh account.
